homepage_section_3.content: Art of Illusion is an excellent application to use in schools because it's simple to understand interface making getting started really easy.
homepage_section_3.title: Awesome for Education

homepage_section_2.content: Art of Illusion will run on any computer that supports Java 5 or later. This includes Windows, macOS and Linux.
homepage_section_2.title: Cross Platform

homepage_section_1.content: Art of Illusion is a free, open source, 3D modelling and rendering studio. Many of its capabilities rival those found in commercial programs. Highlights include subdivision surface based modelling tools, skeleton based animation, and a graphical language for designing procedural textures and materials.
homepage_section_1.title: Easy, Free, Open Source
